_header: God grant me grace the hungry to feed
_description: A prayer of the Seven Bodily Works of Mercy — one stanza rhyme royal

Bod549.First Lines:
God graunt me grace the hungry to ffedeAnd to ȝeue drynke to
                    the thirstye…
Bod549.Last Lines:
…Wyth trewe compassion to vysite þe sekeAnd when he dyeth
                    to bury hym eke
Bod549.Attributed Title: The vii werkes of mercy bodyly (f. 78)
